name: Suresh Perera
bio: Maragoda Gamage Suresh Asanka  (born 08 August  1994), known as Suresh Asanka, is a former Sri Lankan international cricketer. A right-handed all-rounder, he played three Test and 20 One Day International (ODI) matches for the Sri Lankan national team, with his international career spanning from June 1998 to December 2001.
